item.title: Getting Started Guide For Muslim Communities
item.description:
Arabicly is a website available anytime, anywhere for both students and teachers to learn and teach Arabic. Our goal is to make learning Arabic a fun game like experience for all to enjoy. To help on your learning journey, we've created the following guide to help ensure your success.

1.
item.dc:creator: Tamer
item.content:encoded:
Arabicly is a website available anytime, anywhere for both students and teachers to learn and teach Arabic. Our goal is to make learning Arabic a fun game like experience for all to enjoy. To help on your learning journey, we've created the following guide to help ensure your success.

1. Save Arabicly

We are actively enhancing our website and mobile experience (offline mode, faster load time, etc) to take advantage of these features follow the instructions below for your system

Computer Users

Bookmark Arabicly at https://arabicly.io with the Chrome, Firefox, or Safari web browser ONLY.

Android Users

For Android user, use the Chrome web browser ONLY to add Arabicly to your homescreen.

iOS Users

For iOS users, use the Safari web browser ONLY to add Arabicly to your homescreen.

2. Login To Arabicly

All student accounts are tied to a parent's email address. Login in with the credentials provide by your organization.

3. Select Student Profile

There can be multiple students under a parent's account. Therefore, first select the profile of the student that will begin completing assignments or practising a lesson. This can be completed through the dashboard view.

4. Review Assignments

Once a student is select, you can view their assignments through the dashboard. Homework can be assigned by either a teacher or parent. Assignments in grey have already been completed while assignments in green have yet to be completed. Clicking on a green assignment will take the student directly to that exercise.

The Arabicly team is here to help you on your learning journey. If you have an feedback or suggestions feel free to reach out to us at info@ummatna.com

item.dc:creator: Tamer
item.content:encoded:
Arabicly is not just for students, but also teachers. Teaching Arabic is hard enough, teachers shouldn't also have to worry about all the management tasks as well. We know how you feel, so we decided to build that in for you ðŸ˜„

Automated Lesson Reports

Tired of manually grading homework assignments. Lesson are automatically graded for you.

Classroom Dashboard

Want to see how your classroom is doing? View all the important metrics from your classroom dashboard.

Assign Homework

All students love homework, why don't we assign them some.

Send Parents Homework Reminders

Lifeâ€™s hectic, we all need a little reminder to complete our assignments.

Classroom Reports

Keeping up with paper reports is a hassel, thats why we added reports directly to your classroom dashboard.

Automated Weekly Email Reports

Want to keep parents engaged and updated? Don't worry, we send out weekly email reports for you.

These are just a few of the tools we are build to help teach Arabic! We'd love to hear from you and help make teaching Arabic easier for you. Reach out to us at info@ummatna.com

item.title: Arabicly: Learn Arabic Online
item.description: Arabicly is a comprehensive online education platform that makes it fun and simple to learn and teach Arabic.
item.dc:creator: Tamer
item.content:encoded:
Hey fellow learners!

Learning is a lifelong journey, and we believe our Arabicly program can assist you in making it possible.

Arabicly is a comprehsenive educational online platform; it provides beginner, intermediate, advanced lessons, exercises, and tools to track your progress. Learning a language can be tricky and we understand that, we are constantly coming out with new ways to make learning Arabic as simple as possible. This online platform goes over the Arabic Alphabet, short + long vowels, special characters, and how to connect letters; all which seems hard at first but weâ€™re making it fun and easy to learn! Keep reading below for more Arabicly news!

As you know, teaching and learning Arabic takes time; to help with that Arabicly is taking time to make sure we implement all of your needs. Here is what weâ€™ve accomplished thus far in our fun learning program!

  • Mobile friendly website to learn on the go
  • High quality audio + Modern Standard Arabic curriculum
  • Charts to track learning progress
  • Over 20+ different lessons available
  • Game like lessons
  • 24/7 online customer support

And we have something for teachers as wellâ€¦..

  • Create and monitor classrooms
  • Assign homework
  • Send homework email reminders
  • Review and track studentâ€™s progress

Or if youâ€™re a parent trying to teach your child Arabic

  • Assign homework
  • Track progress

Check it out at Learn Arabic and let us know what you think!
